ygData.subject: RE: Feign Death vs. casters and anomolous failures
ygData.msgSnippet: ... I m sorry, I misspoke myself...  There IS a radius of aggression for fresh target acquisition, but once you are targetted, you are not removed from that
ygData.messageBody:
At 2:37 PM -0400 7/13/99, Robb Flynn wrote:


>unfortunately, yes, this is supposed to happen. Supposedly there is a radius
>of aggression which, once the critter has passed it, it will not return, but
>I have never had a monster forget about me. The funniest was running from a
>brigand in the Karanas (West I think it was). I FD (was on a corpse
>retreival run and in no mood to fight this thing), wait, run, FD, wait,
>run... repeat all the way to North Karanas Zone. I was laughing so hard I
>cant believe the dumb brigand didn't know I was alive! =D

I'm sorry, I misspoke myself... There IS a radius of aggression
for fresh target acquisition, but once you are targetted, you are not
removed from that list until you zone.

--
Aaron Braunstein
Pacific Data Management, Inc.

<aaron_braunstein@...>
